rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome guests and ensure positive energy flow according to Vastu principles. The living area merges seamlessly with the open-plan kitchen, featuring Mediterranean-inspired decor, ample natural light, and functional layout for social gatherings.

vastu_considerations.notes: Ensure that the living area is well-ventilated with natural light from windows facing south-east.

rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, this kitchen features modern Mediterranean design elements including natural stone countertops and terracotta tiles. The layout emphasizes open space with easy access between cooking and dining areas.

vastu_considerations.notes: The kitchen should ideally be positioned in the northern part of the ground floor to promote health.

rooms.description: This spacious bedroom features Mediterranean decor with natural finishes, ensuring comfort and privacy. The design is Vastu-aligned, with emphasis on peaceful rest.

vastu_considerations.notes: The master bedroom is ideally located towards the west to benefit from cooling breezes.

rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed for occasional visitors, with a compact yet comfortable layout. It respects Vastu principles by ensuring proper ventilation and natural light.

vastu_considerations.notes: Positioned to maintain balance in energy flow for guests.

rooms.description: A versatile study area that can serve as a home office. The design includes ample natural lighting with an emphasis on creating a productive environment.

vastu_considerations.notes: The study area should face east to harness the energy of the rising sun.

rooms.description: A functional bathroom designed with privacy and modern fixtures. Its placement considers Vastu principles to maintain cleanliness and positive flow.

vastu_considerations.notes: The bathroom should ideally be placed in the south-west corner to maintain balance.

openings.description: A wide, inviting door facing north-east as per Vastu guidelines for welcoming positive energy.
Large windows offering abundant natural light and scenic views of the garden, enhancing both aesthetics and Vastu compliance.
Strategically placed to ensure proper ventilation in the kitchen while maintaining an open-plan feel.
Windows in bedrooms designed to maximize natural light and maintain energy flow according to Vastu principles.
